Title: Gulaal
Writer: Raj Singh Chaudhary (story), Anurag Kashyap (screenplay and dialogue), Anurag Kashyap (story), Aparnaa Malhotra (story), Sanjay Maurya (story)
Actors: Kay Kay Menon, Raj Singh Chaudhary, Jesse Randhawa, Deepak Dobriyal
Plot: A law student witnesses deception, homicide, and crime after being elected as General Secretary of his college.
